comment: "Editor responded quickly, easy to work with. Filling out first-time contract and payment payment paperwork is a bit of a hassle but, all in all, seems to be a smooth system (rare in Asia) and professional editors."
"Responded quickly to a cold pitch. Easy to work with. Professional payment system. Doesn't get smoother than this in Asia."
"The editor and his assistants were very easy to work with; they responded to emails in a very timely manner."
